author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is looking for a consultant to conduct an organizational capacity strategic plan -- "to develop a plan for the organization's staffing needs for the next 5 to 10 years", 
Also, if you're organization has gone through a similar process in the last 2 years, may I refer our member to you to talk about how, when, why, etc?
Thank you,
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
pmuse@transformgov.org
888-468-6450
title: Organizational Capacity Strategic Plan
